    • Data science projects

    Election simulations in Python and Julia

    Retroactive simulations/analyses for the 2012 US Presidential electionl. Developed primarily from the 'Desperately Seeking Silver' homework and tutorial. Python (SciPy, NumPy, pandas) and Julia (DataFrames, GLM) used to create simulate outcomes. Working on extending to other methods and elections.

    GitHub repo
    Project page

    Google Python course in Julia

    Parallel implementation of Google Python course implemented in base Julia. Devised as way to learn general Julia programming.
